summary: This document is an email forwarding a news article from the New York Daily News about Jeffrey Epstein's final days at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York. The email was sent on December 28, 2020, and discusses revelations from inmates regarding Epstein's time in jail before his death.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the forwarded news article detailing his final days in jail before his death.

events.title: Email Forwarding News Article
events.description: An email is sent forwarding a New York Daily News article about Jeffrey Epstein's final days at the NYC jail.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York City
keyFacts: The document is an email dated December 28, 2020, forwarding a news article.
The forwarded article is from the New York Daily News and reveals details about Jeffrey Epstein's final days at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in NYC.
The information in the article comes from revelations by inmates at the jail.
